manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: OUR MEMORY FOAM PILLOWS CAN IMPOROVE YOUR SLEEP QUALITY AND HELP YOU HAVE A NICE SLEEP COOLING , ULTRAL SOFT, SUPPORTIVE, BRATHABLE MEMORY FOAM PILLOW WITH PREMIUM INNER FILLING 90% premium polyurethane - Foam "with memory" ,Reduce the pressure points to conform and adjust to the shape of your body when you move during the night, so they give good support to your neck.10% Premium feather ----It is one of the most comfortable fillings because it provides a good balance between firmness and softness and adapts well to the contour of the bodyHigh-tech Gel infused-----It is the firmer type of filler. As it adapts well to the contour of the body, it provides good support to the neck and back.Before your first use, remember to pat and squeeze the pillow to expand to its shape and put the pillow in dryer for 5 to 10 minutes to speed up the fluff process right out of package. This will get your shredded memory foam pillow to its best shape and normal fluffy.005

ADJUSTABLE HEIGHT PILLOW- UP TO YOU You can add or remove the inside filler to find the most comfortable level for you Get away from too high or too low. You can make a pillow which if perfect for you. SCIENTIFIC DESIGN-RELIEF DISCOMFORT,REDUCE PRESSURE Design based on human body engineering Well fit your neck curve and support your head, neck and shoulder Reduce neck, cervical discomfort Help you to have a nice deep sleep

ONE SIDE is CLOUDY COMFORTABLE BAMBOO SURFACE & the OTHER SIDE is COOLING SURFACE UNIQUE COOLING SURFACE SIDE DESIGN will GIVE YOU COOLING FEELING ALL NIGHT. You can touch the cooling as soon as you sleeping on it. Perfect cooling bed pillows for sleeping, expecially for hot sleepers. WONDERFUL GIFTS FOR PARENTS, OURSELVES, FRIENDS, PREGNANCY WOMEN, TRAVEL enthusiast. TIPS:We suggest that you use our cooling pillow with an air conditioner or a fan to ensure the best effect of lasting cooling.

ADJUSTABLE INNER GEL MEMORY FOAM FILLING Our shredded memory foam filling has been injected into a cooling gel, which is designed to keep you cool all night.There are 2 smooth zipper on the outside memory foam pillow cover. So you can open the zipper and add or remove the filling as you need. So convenient. Don't need to worry about your 2 pack queen pillows are too high or too low anymore. Because You can make a pillow unique perfectly fit for yourself. NEVER BE FLAT BED PILLOWS Please give it a period of time for bounce back the first time you receive it. You can tap and squeeze the pillow to help the pillows back to shape.It is thick and firm, and won’t flatten as you shift throughout the night.The 2 pack queen memory foam pillows for sleepers will never be flat. After several months use. Please kindlly Pat or place in the dryer for three minutes to return to shape MACHINE WASHABLE OUTSIDE PILLOW COVER There are zippers on the cover, you can take off it easily. Very easy care.The outside bed pillows cover is machine washable (machine wash cold and liquid detergents if needed; DO NOT use bleach). The inner pillow cover and inner filling are not washable.We sincerely advice you to purchase 4 pack. Many customers gain 4-6 pack for exchange. And many send them to friends and families as gifts.

PERFECT SLEEPING PILLOWS FOR ALL SLEEPERS PREMIUM BAMBOO COVER- ULTRA-SOFT, SO COMFORTABLE3D technology bamboo fiber breathable pillow case provides you with a SOFT COMFORATBLE sleeping environment.The bamboo cover will help you to feel cooling when you sleep.bamboo cover machine washable-easy to carePERFECT ADJUSTABLE MEMORY FOAM BAMBOO PILLOW FOR SIDE, BACK, STOMACH SLEEPERS. Please kindly note that all bamboo products have bamboo odour which is not harmful to human body. It's easy to solve this problem. 1. Separate outer pillowcase from the inner pillow and use machine wash cold and liquid detergents if needed; DO NOT use bleach. 2. Resting the inner case/pillow under open areas to release the smell. 3. And/or Open your window and lean that pillow against the window screen, changing sides periodicall

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Transformative Comfort and Cooling for a Restful Night’s Sleep
reviews.reviewText: Finding the perfect pillow is akin to discovering a sleep sanctuary; with the Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping, I believe my quest has come to a luxurious end. These pillows, boasting shredded memory foam, adjustable filling, and innovative cooling technology, promised a solution to my sleep challenges. Here's my comprehensive assessment after several weeks of use:Comfort and Support:The shredded memory foam offers a plush yet supportive feel that adapts to the contours of your head and neck, providing optimal support regardless of your sleeping position. The adjustability of the filling is a game-changer, allowing me to customize the pillow’s loft to my preferred comfort level – a boon for a side sleeper like me.Cooling Technology:The bamboo cover, combined with the gel-infused memory foam, works effectively to dissipate heat, maintaining a cool and comfortable sleeping surface throughout the night. This technology has significantly improved my sleep quality, reducing night sweats and discomfort.Material Quality and Durability:The quality of materials used in these pillows is evident from the moment you touch them. The bamboo cover is not only soft and breathable but also hypoallergenic, making it suitable for sensitive skin. After weeks of use and a couple of washes, the pillows have retained their shape and firmness, attesting to their durability and the quality of the memory foam used.Ease of Maintenance:The washable and removable bamboo cover makes maintaining these pillows a breeze. Being able to clean the cover regularly helps in keeping the pillows fresh and hygienic, a must-have feature for anyone prioritizing cleanliness in their sleep environment.Pros:Customizable support with adjustable shredded memory foam filling.Effective cooling technology for a comfortable sleep, even in warm climates.High-quality, durable materials that retain shape and support over time.Hypoallergenic bamboo cover, ideal for sensitive skin, with easy maintenance.Cons:Adjusting the filling to find the perfect loft may require some trial and error.Final Thoughts:The Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping are a remarkable blend of comfort, support, and innovative cooling technology. Their adjustability and quality construction address a wide range of sleep preferences and needs, making them a versatile choice for side, back, and stomach sleepers alike.Recommendation:For those in search of a cooling, supportive, and customizable sleeping experience, these pillows are an excellent investment. Whether you're dealing with night sweats, seeking neck support, or simply in pursuit of a luxurious night’s sleep, this set of two king-size pillows offers a transformative impact on sleep quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bet Pillow Ever
reviews.reviewText: I have tried every type of pillow, these pillows top them all. They are the most comfortable pillow ever. They put Mr. Pillow pillows to shame! They plump up, they are exactly what is advertised, cooling & supportive! They price is amazing. I recommend these pillows if your looking for quality, comfort, support & good sleeping!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty nice and fluffy
reviews.reviewText: Bought these to replace my old pillows as they became extremely flat.As others have said, there is a smell to them. Per the instructions, I put them in the dryer for a little while after I first got them. That seemed to help a little and the smell went away after a couple days.They come extremely full of the foam material inside. I had to remove about half of the stuffing for them to be comfortable, but I like that they include all the extra and removing/adding the material is very easy.They are very fluffy and comfortable. They get nice and cool very quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth Every Penny - Great Pillows for Hot Sleepers
reviews.reviewText: Hey there, pillow seekers! So, I recently stumbled upon these magical wonders called Cooling Bed Pillows, and let me just say, they've been a game-changer for my sleep game.First things first, they're like a little slice of heaven for your noggin. You know that feeling when you flip your pillow to the cold side? Well, imagine that, but on a whole new level. These bad boys are surprisingly very cool to the touch, and it's like they've got some built-in air conditioning just for your head. No more sweaty nights or wrestling with the sheets – just pure, cool bliss.But that's not even the best part. Brace yourself for the ultimate pillow power move – you can adjust the firmness! Yeah, you heard me right. It's like a choose-your-own-adventure for your head and neck. Soft, firm, somewhere in between – you're the boss of your own comfort. I personally love sinking into a fluffy cloud after a long day, but if you're into a firmer support, these pillows have got your back, literally.The material they're made from feels like a hug from a cloud, and I swear I've been sleeping better than ever. It's like upgrading from economy class to first class for your nightly adventures in dreamland.Now, I don't know about you, but I'm pretty picky when it comes to my pillows. I mean, they're practically a VIP guest in your bed, right? These Cooling Bed Pillows have earned their spot in my exclusive pillow hall of fame. If you're on the fence about investing in a couple, do yourself a favor and take the plunge. Your head will thank you, and you'll wonder how you ever slept without them. Cheers to cool dreams and even cooler pillows!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We have had a couple down pillows that I really like but they are getting old and new ones are crazy expensive. We also have the cheap foam ones that I hate and you are lucky if you get 3 months out of them. I ordered a set of these during prime after going through all the different pillows available. These pillows are awesome. We have had them for about a month and they are just as good as the day we got them. You can adjust the amount of filling but we liked them how they came. The cover for them is great. It's thick and has a soft side and a cool side. And the cool side actually stays cool. We just ordered another set for our daughter for Christmas. I would absolutely recommend these pillows.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great pillows , very comfy, and cool to sleep on. Great bargain for the money too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m normally not a fan of buying pillow online since I like to feel them in person or at the store. The pillow is made of shredded memory foam. This pillow is soft but will still hold its shape and won’t go flat on you. One side has a cooling pad and the other is just regular material. My previous pillow was a down feather stuffing and I had it for years and was hesitant to replace it. After getting this new pillow that old was was out the window.
Easily adjustable and no strong or irritating odor. Has a bamboo material on one side and a cooling material on the other side for your choice.
Llevo solo unos días usándola y ya se ve apachurrada. Mala compra

reviews.reviewTitle: looks good but doesnt feel good enough after a while
reviews.reviewText: My main problem is that those covers get warm very fast as soon as your face touches them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: The best pillow I've had... So I ordered more for a present
reviews.reviewText: Having researched a fair bit for the perfect pillow, I'm glad I did because this has given me the best nights sleep in a fair few years. I suffer with Crohn's and been in flare for a long time. I can't remember the last nights undisturbed sleep I had but since getting this pillow the health of my sleep is vast improving and an added benefit is my neck pains are easing a lot.I love that you can reduce the firmness and fullness of the pillow by taking some memory foam out, to get the perfect ratio for you. The added feature of the cool and warm side is perfect for when I have them night sweats and tropical moments from meds. It is a feature I never knew I needed.It is the kind of pillow you would take everywhere with you for them weekends away. So go so that I bought another a few days later for a present. A VERY GOOD INVESTMENT

This pillow is well made and the cooling technology really does work. When you first unwrap it, the pillow looks as flat as a pizza box. After 24 hours, it expands to full size. It is well-stuffed and quite high. Unfortunately, it is simply too firm for me. Even if you take out some of the stuffing, it doesn’t change how firm the memory foam is overall. The spot where your head rests does soften a little, but if you turn your head to the side, it is like bringing your head out of a hole and onto a rock.If you love a firm pillow, this might be for you. If you sleep in one position and never move your head, this might be for you. Too firm for me.
